titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Finance.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Finance.

action.text: Committee on Finance. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Wyden under authority of the order of the Senate of 02/13/2021. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: This resolution authorizes the Senate Committee on Finance to make specified expenditures and employ personnel for the 117th Congress.
